FuncDef: The display sftp-client command displays all of the currently effective configurations on the SFTP client.
Examples: The source address of the SFTP client is 1.1.1.1.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the source IP address of an SFTP client is set, you can run the display sftp client command to view the configuration. If sftp client-source is not configured, then by default the SFTP client source IP address is 0.0.0.0.
